alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Macomb; Oakland; St. Clair; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lapeer, Wayne, eastern Oakland, Macomb and central St. Clair Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 1244 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Imlay City to near Warren to near Romulus. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Warren and Imlay City around 1250 AM EDT. Grosse Pointe and Almont around 1255 AM EDT. St. Clair Shores and Capac around 100 AM EDT. Wyandotte, Trenton and Grosse Ile around 105 AM EDT. Memphis and Emmett around 115 AM EDT. Marysville around 140 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Anchorville, Franklin, Keego Harbor, Melvindale, Gibraltar, Shelby Township, Ray Center, Utica, Auburn Hills and Lake Angelus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
